channel.title: Black-Magic 317 ll Brand New ll Online 24/7 ll Active Owner ll Join Now!
channel.description:
[size=11pt]Welcome to Black-Magic 317! We are a brand new Private Server that has been in, development for the past 6+ months.
Forums/Website: http://blackmagic.createaforum.com/index.php?action=forum
Desktop Client: http://uppit.com/rdszabte0ue7/Offical_Black-Magic_Client.rar **The Cache Does Take A While To Load.... Sorry about That.** ***Cuz of this ^ Everyone will get a free 10m upon login.*** ***Again.. Im sorry it take a little to download :/***
Webclient: Coming Soon!
[size=12pt]~~Features of Black-Magic~~ - Server is based on Pking and skilling (whichever you perfer to do.) - 634 character models, 602 Animations, and 642 Items. - Custom client background & login screen - 10+ Bosses including Nomad, Mutant Tarn, The Inadequacy, kbd, etc... - Korasi about 90% (Special attack Doesnt Work, but thats already on my to-do list.) - dragon claws & Special attack for them are 100% working! - Different minigames to choose from (Barrows, fight pits, duel arena, ice-path, and more!) - Multiple training locations including low level, med-level, and high level. - 10+ Shops to choose training gear from! -- Level point system + Shop - New custom skilling zone - 100% working turmoil and curses - ^Same with pk-points + 2 shops!^ - Clobal chat/help Clan Chat - Many shops around home to choose from - Dragonfire shield 100% working with charging - 100% pvp armours and items (Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)
[size=12pt]Pictures Of Black-Magic
Login Screen [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/aw65i.jpg[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/25akv0m.jpg[/img]
Pk-Point Shops [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/13yi0qg.jpg[/img]
Level-Point Shop [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/14b3xol.jpg[/img]
Quest Tab [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2wc4pwj.jpg[/img]
Boss/Training Tab [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/10fygyv.jpg[/img]
Magebook Teleports [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/21j0rhu.jpg[/img]
IcePath Mini [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/25plaur.jpg[/img]
Phoenix Boss & Dragon Claws [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/f25xd4.jpg[/img]
Nomad & Ags [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/o5ylw2.jpg[/img]
New Skilling Zone [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/zojby9.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

[size=11pt]Welcome to Black-Magic 317!
We are a brand new Private Server that has been in,
development for the past 6+ months.

Forums/Website: http://blackmagic.createaforum.com/index.php?action=forum

Desktop Client: http://uppit.com/rdszabte0ue7/Offical_Black-Magic_Client.rar
The Cache Does Take A While To Load… Sorry about That.
Cuz of this ^ Everyone will get a free 10m upon login.
Again… Im sorry it take a little to download

Webclient: Coming Soon!

[size=12pt]Features of Black-Magic

  • Server is based on Pking and skilling (whichever you perfer to do.)
  • 634 character models, 602 Animations, and 642 Items.
  • Custom client background & login screen
  • 10+ Bosses including Nomad, Mutant Tarn, The Inadequacy, kbd, etc…
  • Korasi about 90% (Special attack Doesnt Work, but thats already on my to-do list.)
  • dragon claws & Special attack for them are 100% working!
  • Different minigames to choose from (Barrows, fight pits, duel arena, ice-path, and more!)
  • Multiple training locations including low level, med-level, and high level.
  • 10+ Shops to choose training gear from!
    – Level point system + Shop
  • New custom skilling zone
  • 100% working turmoil and curses
  • ^Same with pk-points + 2 shops!^
  • Clobal chat/help Clan Chat
  • Many shops around home to choose from
  • Dragonfire shield 100% working with charging
  • 100% pvp armours and items (Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)
